category: news
title: "ACI Worldwide Ranked in the Top 20 Largest Global Providers of Financial Technology by IDC FinTech Rankings"
excerpt: "ACI Worldwide, a leading global provider of real-time payments and digital payment software solutions, today announced its ranking in the IDC (News - Alert) Financial Insights 2021 FinTech Rankings. ACI is ranked 19 on this international list of financial technology companies that were judged according to their global revenues attributed to financial institutions."
